sys_script_include.name: getTotalPrice

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_a16b277b9734511026dadb24a253af18
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_843001_final_app.getTotalPrice</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>getTotalPrice</name><script><![CDATA[var getTotalPrice = Class.create();
getTotalPrice.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getPrice: function() {
		var arr = this.getParameter('sysparm_orderLineSysId');
		var products = arr.split(',');
		var total = 0;
		for (var i = 0; i <= products.length; i++) {
			var bT = new GlideRecord('u_product_order');
			bT.addQuery('sys_id', products[i]);
			bT.query();
			while (bT.next()) {
				total += parseInt(bT.price);
			}
		}
		return total;
	},
	
	
    type: 'getTotalPrice'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-27 07:39:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>a16b277b9734511026dadb24a253af18</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getTotalPrice</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Final Application" source="x_843001_final_app">112ed6579734111026dadb24a253afe2</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Final Application">112ed6579734111026dadb24a253afe2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a16b277b9734511026dadb24a253af18</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-27 07:59:28</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
